document_data.name: ''Disruption''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Disruption''''' was a [[weapon quality]] that could be added to magical weapons. It could destroy [[undead]] outright.
document_data.Powers: Whenever an undead foe was struck with a ''disruption'' weapon, it had to successfully resist the effect with an effort of will or be destroyed instantly.
document_data.Creation: One who would enchant a ''disruption'' weapon had to have the ''[[heal]]'' spell available. The property could only be used on a bludgeoning weapon, such as a [[club]] or [[mace]].
document_data.Uses: Some veteran [[Thayan gladiator]]s had their horns, claws, and other natural weapons enhanced as weapons of ''disruption''.
document_data.Notable Disruption Weapons:
* ''[[Dawnspeaker]]'', the personal weapon of the sun god [[Lathander]].
* ''[[Celestial mace]]s'', the favored weapons of [[astral deva]]s.
* ''[[Mace of disruption|Maces of disruption]]'', undead-slaying [[mace]]s that could be improved with the use of [[illithium]].
* A ''flail of disruption'' was carried by [[Gogal]] in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/City of Delights/Gem of Zakhara|64}}
